title: 간접의문문 고급
description: 과거형 간접의문이나 복잡한 간접 질문을 연습합니다.
examples: I wondered what he had been thinking about all those years.
She couldn't understand why the project had been delayed so frequently.
We need to determine whether the investment will have been worthwhile by then.
learning_points: 복잡한 시제와 결합된 간접의문문의 고급 활용

sentences.kr: 나는 그가 그 모든 시간 동안 무엇을 생각하고 있었는지 궁금했다.
sentences.en: I wondered what he had been thinking about all those years.

sentences.kr: 그녀는 프로젝트가 왜 그렇게 자주 지연되었는지 이해할 수 없었다.
sentences.en: She couldn't understand why the project had been delayed so frequently.

sentences.kr: 우리는 그때까지 투자가 가치가 있었을 것인지 결정해야 한다.
sentences.en: We need to determine whether the investment will have been worthwhile by then.

sentences.kr: 그들은 어떻게 그런 복잡한 문제를 해결해 왔는지 설명했다.
sentences.en: They explained how they had been solving such complex problems.

sentences.kr: 관리자는 누가 그 중요한 결정을 내렸는지 알고 싶어했다.
sentences.en: The manager wanted to know who had made that crucial decision.

sentences.kr: 우리는 시장이 언제 회복될지 예측할 수 없다.
sentences.en: We cannot predict when the market will have recovered.

sentences.kr: 그는 왜 그 기회를 놓쳤는지 자신에게 물어보고 있었다.
sentences.en: He was asking himself why he had missed that opportunity.

sentences.kr: 전문가들은 기술이 어떻게 발전해 올 것인지 토론했다.
sentences.en: Experts discussed how technology would have been evolving.
